Articles.Content: ok so i have the ISS CanadArm2 part from BobCat Romfarer but it will not show up in game what would i have to do to get this to show up here the part just in case some one out there know what to do.https://www.dropbox.com/sh/cchdehokuy0zx9n/l-RdrVSKo9

ok so i have the ISS CanadArm2 part from BobCat Romfarer but it will not show up in game what would i have to do to get this to show up here the part just in case some one out there know what to do.https://www.dropbox.com/sh/cchdehokuy0zx9n/l-RdrVSKo9

Set Category to something like Utility or Science
The canadarm requires the lazor system mod to be installed to support it

Set Category to something like Utility or Science

i did set it at utility as well as tried putting it in to the part folder to see if that helped, still had no luck.

The canadarm requires the lazor system mod to be installed to support it

i do have to plugin right now all i want is the part for now but when it did not show up i figured maybe i needed it for the part to show up not sure why id need it if i just wanted the part for now...... i have way to many plugins right now

It will show up in a non-functional way without the romfarer plugin if you edit the line at the top of the part.cfg file :

change : module = PartRoboticArmCanadarm

to : module = Part

You will then be able to attach it as a part but it will not be movable. If you add it to a vessel in that state, you will be able to make it functional later by adding the romfarer dll and reversing the edit.

Edited February 27, 2014 by Roxette

In your KSP folder there's. folder named KSP_data. Look for output_log.txt and put it up for upload and provide a link here. dropbox.com is a good site. Patebin works too.

Could you please try to use capitalization and interpunction? It makes messages a whole lot easier to read

I'm not in school so what the !@$# , I was in a rush and so what if I'm lazy just answer the question. Dam some people just can't leave someones mistakes alone, I wonder how perfect you are???

It will show up in a non-functional way without the romfarer plugin if you edit the line at the top of the part.cfg file :

change : module = PartRoboticArmCanadarm

to : module = Part

You will then be able to attach it as a part but it will not be movable. If you add it to a vessel in that state, you will be able to make it functional later by adding the romfarer dll and reversing the edit.

I'm not in school so what the !@$# , I was in a rush and so what if I'm lazy just answer the question.

I was not sure what the question was, that was the whole point. I had a hard time finding out what you wanted because of your writing style. I am also not sure that attitude works out very well when you want people to help you, but you will need to figure that one out yourself.

I am glad everything works as it should now, have fun.
